description:
Uses Combinatorial Optimization to construct an optimal prompt with embedded reasons. Sign up here:
https://forms.gle/oWNv2NKjBNaqqvCx6

openai_api_key.info: The OpenAI API Key to use for the OpenAI model.

username.info: Username to authenticate access to Icosa CR API

password.info: Password to authenticate access to Icosa CR API.

errors.timeout: Request timeout after 100 seconds. The optimization process may be taking longer than expected. Please try again.
errors.authentication_failed: Authentication failed. Please check your username and password.
errors.access_denied: Access denied. Your account may not have permission to use this service. Please sign up at https://forms.gle/oWNv2NKjBNaqqvCx6
errors.rate_limit: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait a moment and try again.
errors.server_error: Server error {status}. The Icosa CR API is experiencing issues. Please try again later.
errors.connection_failed: Failed to connect to Icosa CR API. Please check your internet connection.

logs.building_prompt: Building optimized prompt - Prompt length: {prompt_length} chars, Model: {model}
logs.sending_request: Sending request to Icosa CR API
logs.optimization_complete: Prompt optimization complete - {reasons_count} reason(s) selected, Optimized length: {optimized_length} chars
logs.no_reasons: No reasons available. Please run build_prompt first.
